column5: Why does it seem that whenever I buy any tackle that BPS has on sale, I have amazing luck with it?!  Top of the line Rapalas......not too great..  Clearance Storms or BPS Brand.... WooHoo!!
Did you go today?? How recent is this?! ... I too was thinking of hitting BPS soon!

I know what you mean. I have good luck on Cotton Cordell Wally Divers (not that they are cheap necessarily) and a fire tiger Frenzy thing that I can't seem to loose. My B-in-L swears by "AC Shiners" (again not cheap, but not Rapala either). It could have to do with a confidence level that you have with certain lures over others? Jim
Purchases throughout the season.  The last purchase was $2 storm suspending shads.  I could not keep the pike off of them!
